about_the_game:
Dungeons and Dining Tables is a Cosy-Adventure RPG that takes inspiration from the cosy nature of home decorating with aesthetically pleasing furniture pieces and the fast-paced contrast of exciting 3rd person combat across procedural generated levels in a fantasy world made of megalithic furniture mountains and populated by kleptomaniac creatures out to ruin your day.

"Awaken axolotl... Explore a beautiful furniture riddled landscape... Seek out the Tailor..."

﻿ Fight creatures with your sword.

﻿ Defeat bosses to rebuild your community.

﻿ Collect furniture to decorate your home and increase your skills. ﻿

Your perfect home is just a dungeon away.

Where will the Axolotl find these magical furnishings? Where else: In dungeons! Each of these is a procedurally generated adventure that becomes more complex as you unlock new abilities.Treasures await behind every corner, along with surprises and furniture boosting Comfort in new and impressive ways!

What is this Comfort? Why, Comfort is everything! Comfort is how you build back Kindlerest, grow stronger, and drive back the grumps! Every piece of furniture is magical. It can improve your stats - or improve the homes in Kindlerest, making them more cozy and opening up new ways to restore the town and rekindle the community!

Dungeons and Dining Tables is more than, well, dungeons and dining tables. It's about bringing a community of cute, fuzzy animals back together, turning Kindlerest into a flourishing safe haven and a refuge from the thorny life beyond its borders. Kindness given is kindness received, and that's doubly true for Kindlerest.

Of course, you’ll also have to deal with more ornery inhabitants of the forests around Kindlerest. Many of them want to steal your furniture or poke holes in it - and will have to be very kindly convinced not to. As will the bosses! Each of these handcrafted encounters will test your winds and require extra levels of kindness to overcome and bring back Comfort across the land!
